about_the_game:
This demo contains the first world of the main game, secrets and all! Have fun using the drill hat to rip and tear your way through all sorts of silly challenges! We cannot guarantee your save file will carry over to the final game, especially as things may change between this version of the game and the release version.

Below is a description of the full game:



After a whirlwind odyssey with his friend, our accountant-turned-hero Orbo decides to make his way home by way of Peeb's signature biplane. While flying over the coast of a mysterious vacation resort, Peeb's attempt to demonstrate a cool loop-de-loop turns into a spectacular nosedive that is only one-upped by the resulting explosion.

Following the crash, Orbo is left stranded, with Peeb nowhere in sight. Left to his own devices, Orbo begins an all-new quest to buy a ferry back to the mainland, but in the process he may discover there's more to the island than meets the eye...

Armed with some new moves and a set of snazzy hats, Orbo sets out on his final adventure: an exodus of epic proportions.



While on the island, Orbo can discover new hats to enhance his lightning-fast moveset. Burrow beneath the earth, take to the skies, and shatter people's jaws like a cannon ball with the new drill, propeller and bowler caps respectively.

Even beyond their remarkable movement capabilities, these hats are an essential tool for solving problems around the island. Use the drill hat to disassemble the world and forage for gourmet ingredients to create a delightful stew. Use the propeller hat to manipulate your environment and kill pesky opponents with a controllable laser turret. Use the bowler cap to hop into the driver's seat of special machines and perform amateur surgery on your friends. That's not even mentioning the secret hats that await you where you least expect them...

Learn the extents of your hats' capabilities, and you can handle anything.



Orbo's classic moveset is back, with some all-new upgrades! Not only are the controls tighter, but Orbo is now armed with his new cruise-roll ability that allows him to quickly cover ground in style. Combine this with your new hats, and Orbo can quickly launch into spectacular aerial maneuvers, high-speed homing attacks, and more.

Special challenge levels provide you with a nice breath of fresh air from the main campaign and a chance to go on silly side stories that will test how you move your body. Help a morose goblin create a musical feast for the ears, explore the mysterious ruins of Smilulon's Peak, and weather the dastardly machinations of the wicked professor...

Jump, flip, airspin, launch yourself like a .50 caliber bullet, Orbo is back in action like never before.



The island might seem like paradise on the surface, but underneath it lies a mystery that may very well change Orbo's life forever... Uncover the truth behind this mysterious land's construction, the individuals inhabiting it, and why Orbo ended up here of all places...

  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 4.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: After crash-landing on the sandy shores of a mysterious resort, Orbo must utilize his newfound abilities to make his way home. Even in this paradise at sea, our hero is in more danger than ever before... It's time to make your escape in this comedically surreal 3D platformer!
